ygData.subject: Re: Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The only other idea I can think of is that it decreases the duration of charm only.  But that s extraordinarily difficult to test since you ll need three
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Jim Mattson wrote:
>
> Has anyone figured out what this song does? I went to the Arena with
> a friend to test it out, and near as I could tell, it did nothing.
> Someone at one time suggested that maybe it reduced the duration of
> harmful DoTs, but her Creeping Crud did full damage to me.

The only other idea I can think of is that it decreases the
duration of charm only. But that's extraordinarily difficult
to test since you'll need three people (you to play it, a
friend in your party, and an enchanter to charm your friend)
to test it, and you have to test it many times since charm's
duration is random anyway.

Maybe we should ask Alenia (Verant)?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
